name: SharePointAddInPatching
description: Set URL and Client ID of a SharePoint Add-In
helpMarkDown: Allows to change the URL and Client ID of SharePoint Add-Ins. [More Information](https://github.com/iozag/sharepoint-build-tasks)
author: IOZ AG

inputs.name: AddInFile
inputs.label: File pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the SharePoint AppManifest or Add-In file which should be updated.  Wildcards can be used.  For example `**\AppManifest.xml` for all AppManifests or `**\*.app` for all Add-In files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: Url
inputs.label: Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url of the website which should be set in the Add-In files.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: ClientId
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client ID which should be set in the Add-In files.
